---------------------------------
MediaManager
---------------------------------

1. Android

Call from MainActivity: CrossMediaManager.Current.Init(this);

2. Other platforms

Call from AppDelegate, etc: CrossMediaManager.Current.Init();

3. Play media

await CrossMediaManager.Current.Play("Some url here");
